refnamediv.refpurpose: convert dnstrace output to human-readable form

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: dnstracesort is a filter that converts the output of dnstrace1 from machine-parseable form into human-readable form. It uses TeleType Model 37 control sequences for boldface and underline, which can be interpreted by less1 or converted to your terminal's own control sequences with ul1.

refsection.title: History
refsection.para: dnstracesort was originally part of DanielJ.Bernstein's djbdns toolset in 2000.

refsection.title: Author
refsection.para: Original code and documentation by DanielJ.Bernstein. Documentation modernizations by Jonathande Boyne Pollard.
